metadata.title: Breeze Women’s Biking Cycling Gloves - Performance Mountain Dirt Bike and Cycle Gloves with Adjustable Wrist Closure and Pull-Off Tapes
features: Features adjustable wrist closure, ventilated mesh, and high-density foam palm padding
Performance-enhancing design comes in several attractive colors for a custom experience
Reduces the risk of blisters and numbness associated with bike-riding activities
Smart-feature finger pull-off tabs give wearers the ultimate in comfort and convenience
Easy-to-use sizing guide allows you to choose the perfect size before you order
description: Experience riding in a new way when you slip on Crown Gear’s Breeze women’s biking gloves.
These form-fitting gloves are specially designed to deliver the ultimate in protection and performance improvement.

- Featuring high-density foam in the palm for impact absorption and blister protection, breathable mesh, and an adjustable wrist closure, you’ll want to wear these comfortable gloves every time you take your bike outside. Pull-off finger tabs streamline the glove removal process for added convenience.
Add these compact gloves to your riding accessories to reduce your risk of sustaining blisters, feeling numbness, or straining the muscles in your hand.
With several attractive colors, you can match your Breeze gloves to your bike or your riding apparel.
Ideal for trail riding, road riding, and racing, these easy-to-size gloves are a must-have for your next Amazon order.

- Features adjustable wrist closure, ventilated mesh, and high-density foam palm padding - Performance-enhancing design comes in several attractive colors for a custom experience - Reduces the risk of blisters and numbness associated with bike-riding activities - Smart-feature finger pull-off tabs give wearers the ultimate in comfort and convenience - Easy-to-use sizing guide allows you to choose the perfect size before you order
